meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride was the joltiest experience of my life.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake was the joltiest event the town had ever experienced.
meanings.sent3: The joltiest part of the movie was when the character unexpectedly jumped out of the closet.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden outburst of laughter was the joltiest moment in the silent room.
meanings.sent5: The joltiest memory from the trip was when the hot air balloon unexpectedly dropped a few feet.

meanings.sent1: The road was the joltiest I had ever driven on.
meanings.sent2: The joltiest part of the dance routine was the sudden spin at the end.
meanings.sent3: The joltiest surprise of the party was when the cake fell off the table.
meanings.sent4: His heart raced at the joltiest moment of the horror movie.
meanings.sent5: The joltiest feeling came over her as she stepped onto the shaky bridge.
